reviews.review: Zombie escape, bhopping, awp clan servers.

After remerging from my horrible addiction of playing CSGO. I have got to say, Counter Strike Source (CSS). Is heaps better than CSGO. This game feels nuacned in terms of gameplay. Thats it, the graphics are good for it's time, but i find it easier, without having my anger taking control of my body (Since then, I have seeked help).

CCS Is a great game, playing it feels like nostogla, or whatever the hell you spell it.

The completely necessary second half for Garry's Mod is very nice. I'd give it an 8 bagels out of 4 on graphics alone.

Although this isn't as polished as CS - Global Offensive, I find it to be much more enjoyable.  Many hours and many games here without cheaters or edgy children screeching racial slurs.  I can understand why many veteran players were unhappy with that game becoming free as it effectively ruined their favorite game.  

If you like CS, but can't stand GO due to the immature people you get matched with, play this instead.

Best CS to buy. Better graphics and more servers than the original games, and way less toxic than CSGO. No pay to win, no cancerous voicechat, no potato graphics. Just pure Counter Strike.

PS: VAC bans are not fun.

Many people said this would be the best CS game. I would say it is the weirdest. Weird here being neither good nor bad; The main point of this game nowadays is the community: If you like surf, zombie mode or bhop, this game is far better than GO IMO.

After years I began to play CSS again and ... I still love it ( now it hurts every time when I play CS:GO). ;)
It's one of  the most popular multiplayer FPS game of all time. The best and legendary map from the CS 1.6, "de_dust2" is here, along with the modified version of that which is only available in CSS and it has three sites, A, B and C. 
Unfortunately, however, there are not many servers online. But there are a some of "Death Match" servers that are full of people and good ping rates so that every one can enjoy and have a good experience.
EDIT:
I still love it but now I do not play it anymore....servers are full of hackers / cheaters and that's not in my line.
